name: Sooligan
tag_list: search, community, local, hyper-local, qa, recommendations, business, rants, raves, local-search, reviews, local-reviews, social-network, social-commerce
overview:
Digitalizing word-of-mouth.

Over 85% of consumers look online for local information. However, traditional methods of local search are often time-consuming, cumbersome, cluttered, and out-of-date.

Sooligan makes it EASIER, FASTER, and FUN to find and share local information..with those people around you. We offer users a real-time reflection of a cityâ€™s sentiments and local environment. We put cities online and make local ideas and happenings available to anyone anywhere in the world.
